channel.title: CVE Feed for Fuji Electric -- Tellus Lite V-Simulator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fuji Electric -- Tellus Lite V-Simulator

item.title: CVE-2022-3085|2024-08-03T01:00:10.804Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator versions 4.0.12.0 and prior are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-3087|2024-08-03T01:00:10.773Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator versions 4.0.12.0 and prior are vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-37022|2024-08-02T03:43:50.589Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which could allow an attacker to manipulate memory, resulting in execution of arbitrary code.

item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
